content:
{"name": "The Salvation Army - Glen Burnie", "alternate_name": "", "description": "**Requirements: 
**
1. Photo ID, proof of income, and mail with recent postmark within the week.
2. Proof of residence in Northern Anne Arundel (Glen Burnie, Hanover, Linthicum, Pasadena, Severn, 21225 part of Anne Arundel County)
3. Book an appointment for assistance. Call in advance.
4. Fresh produce once a month usually on the 4th Wednesday of month", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "511 Crain Highway South", "address_2": null, "city": "Glen Burnie", "state_province": "MD", "postal_code": "21061", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 39.1570234, "longitude": -76.6287937}, "phones": [{"number": "(410) 768-3482", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Tuesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "19:00"}, {"weekday": "Wednesday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}, {"weekday": "Friday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "17:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Call in advance for services"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Bring ID and proof of residence"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}]}
